contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Posen kr Krotoschin.jpg|thumb|right]] '''Kreis Krotoschin''' ({{lang-pl|Powiat [[Krotoszyn|krotoszyÅ„ski]]}}) was a [[county]] in the southern administrative [[Posen district|district of Posen]], in the Prussian [[province of Posen]]. It presently lies in the southern part of [[Poland|Polish]] region of [[Greater Poland Voivodeship]]. ==Civil registry offices == In 1905, these [[civil registry]] offices ({{lang-de|Standesamt}}) served the following towns in ''Kreis Krotoschin'': ==External links== {{coord missing|Germany}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Krotoschin, Kreis}} [[Category:Districts of Prussia]]
